participant_1.background:
I love reading and writing about animals, so my favorite websites are those that feature stories about pets and animal rescue.
i had to get a job early as a child.
I'm a fan of Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors but I'm not much of a cook.
i hate tomatoes.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
i currently suffer from social anxiety.
I enjoy reading about business and finance in my free time.
I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just working on some stuff. You?
Doing some research on animal rescue stories. I'm thinking about volunteering at my local shelter soon.
That's great! I love animals, but I have too much anxiety to volunteer at the shelter. I would just end up wanting to take them all home with me.
That's sweet, but yeah, it can be a lot to take in. I grew up on a farm, so I'm used to being around a lot of animals.
That must have been a lot of fun. I've always lived in the city, so I don't get to see a lot of animals in person.
It was definitely a lot of work, but it was also a lot of fun. I learned a lot about animals and how to care for them.
That's really cool. I've always been fascinated by animals, but I don't know much about how to care for them.
If you're ever interested in learning more, I'm sure I could teach you a thing or two.
That would be awesome! I would love to learn more about animals and how to care for them.
I'm free this weekend if you want to come by my place and I can show you some things.
That sounds great! I'll bring some snacks.
Sounds like a plan. I'll see you this weekend
